column4: Any documentation on this Darwin? It sounds extremely useful.
Oh, also, slightly unreleated... But do you know of a way to code a simple script (that can't be read/is obfuscated) that can SSH so my clients can run the restart command?
I can't really use SSH keys since the IP will be different all the time, and that requires access on their PC to set up.
I don't understand why you can't use ssh
